get.summary: Delivers an overview of all mortgage certificates of a client.

parameters.name: clientKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the client

get.summary: Delivers details about a mortgage certificate.

parameters.name: mortgageCertificateKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the mortgage certificate

get.summary: Searches orders of a client or for an order number. A list of orders in summarised form. Call requires either `clientKey` or `orderID`, or both.

parameters.name: clientKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the client

parameters.name: orderID
parameters.description: ID of the loan order

get.summary: Delivers data about a loan order in use, including a list of the items.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

get.summary: Delivers all amortisations of a loan order.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

get.summary: Delivers all collateral of a loan order.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

get.summary: Delivers all items of a loan order.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

get.summary: Delivers details regarding an item of a loan order.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

parameters.name: itemKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan item

get.summary: Delivers all amortisations for an item of a loan order.

parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

parameters.name: itemKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan item

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

parameters.name: itemKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan item

get.summary: Delivers all real estate liens of a loan order.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

get.summary: Delivers all securities of a loan order.

parameters.name: orderKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

parameters.name: securityKey

get.summary: Delivers all collateral of a security.

parameters.name: securityKey
parameters.description: Technical sequence number of the security

key.description: Technical sequence number of the security

type.description: Reference to the type of security (e.g. 1000: Real estate lien)

subType.description: Reference to the subtype of the security (e.g. 3000: Single-family house)

SecuritySummary.description: Only the most important key data of a security, to provide an overview.

key.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order.

id.description: Order ID of the loan order.

clientKey.description: Technical sequence number of the client.

purpose.description: Comment regarding the loan order, loan purpose

use.description: Date on which the order is put into use

resubmission.description: Resubmission date of the loan order

codes.description: List of all code tables for the given tenant

CodeTablesResponse.description: Response object for a code tables request

href.description: Link to the code table entry/item

key.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

id.description: Order ID of the loan order.

clientKey.description: Technical sequence number of the client.

use.description: Date on which the order is put into use

OrderSummary.description: Only the most important key data of a loan order in use, to provide an overview

key.description: Technical sequence number of the real estate lien

propertyKey.description: Technical sequence number of the property

securitiesType.description: Reference to the type of securities (e.g. 2: Mortgage bonds)

MortgageCertificateSummary.description: Only the most important key data of a mortgage certificate, to provide an overview.

href.description: Link to the code table entry/item

MoneyAmount.description: An amount of money in a currency.

orderKey.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

itemKey.description: Technical sequence number of the loan item

securityKey.description: Technical sequence number of the security

propertyKey.description: Technical sequence number of the property

portfolioKey.description: Technical sequence number of the portfolio

accountCustodyAccountKey.description: Technical sequence number of the account or custody account

lendingFromTo.description: Lending From - To, in percent (only for mortgage collateral)

collateralOrderSecurities.description: Indication of the order in which the collateral of various loans is claimed.

orderWithinCollateral.description: Indication of the order in which the collateral of various loans is claimed. This field is filled if the collateral limits are managed on the credit line item.

type.description: Reference to the type of collateral (e.g. 1000: Real estate lien)

subType.description: Reference to the subtype of the collateral (e.g. 3000: Single-family house)

key.description: Technical sequence number of the amortisation

orderKey.description: Technical sequence number of the loan order

itemKey.description: Technical sequence number of the loan item

accountKey.description: Technical sequence number of the account

toTheDebitOfKey.description: Technical sequence number of the recipient's account on which the credit entry occurs in the case of an indirect amortisation

nextAmortisationDueDate.description: Date of the next due repayment

sequenceNumber.description: Indication of the order in which the collateral claim is amortised

repaymentType.description: Reference to the repayment type (e.g. 2000: Direct amortisation)

key.description: Technical sequence number of the security

portfolioKey.description: Technical sequence number of the portfolio

provider.description: Name or other ID of the security provider

taker.description: Name or other ID of the security taker

type.description: Reference to the type of security (e.g. 1000: Real estate lien)

subType.description: Reference to the subtype of the security (e.g. 3000: Single-family house)

Security.description: Contains detailed information about a security.

date.description: Guarantees (date of issue), insurances (as at), securities (as at), other collateral (as at)

MarketValue.description: Only the most important key data of a security, to provide an overview.

code.description: Identification of the item/code table entry

language.description: Language of the shortcut and the description (ISO-639-1)

shortcut.description: Shortcut of the item/code table entry

description.description: Description of the item/code table entry

Item.description: Code table item, an entry of a code table

name.description: Textual description of the code table

CodeTableResponse.description: Response object for a code table request

insuranceCompanyKey.description: Technical sequence number of the insurance company

Insurance.description: Contains information about the insurance if an insurance serves as security.

templated.description: if true then use {rel} place holder in href (default is true)

reductionPeriod.description: Reference to the reduction period (e.g. 3: monthly)

Guarantee.description: Contains information regarding a guarantee if a guarantee serves as security.

Property.description: Contains information regarding the property if the security is a property.

href.description: Link to the code table entry/item

key.description: Technical sequence number of the mortgage certificate

propertyKey.description: Technical sequence number of the property

maxInterestRate.description: Maximum permissible interest rate on this collateral

securitiesType.description: Reference to the type of securities (e.g. 2: Mortgage bonds)

accountKey.description: Technical sequence number of the account

AccountCustodyAccount.description: Contains information regarding the account or custody account if an account or custody account serves as security.
